architecture/network-architecture.title: Network Architecture
architecture/network-architecture.description: Overview of components and data flow.

architecture/pqc-primer.title: PQC Primer
architecture/pqc-primer.description: Post-quantum cryptography protects against future quantum attacks. Dytallix uses lattice-based signatures for accounts and node keys.

architecture/tokenomics-testnet.title: Tokenomics (Testnet)
architecture/tokenomics-testnet.description: Testnet tokens are issued by the faucet and reset on schedule.

community/community-channels.title: Community Channels
community/community-channels.description: Stay connected during the public testnet.

developers/dev-walkthrough.title: Developer Walkthrough
developers/dev-walkthrough.description: End-to-end guide to build and deploy.

developers/examples/js-quickstart.title: JS Quickstart
developers/examples/js-quickstart.description: Interact with the chain using JavaScript.

developers/openapi.title: OpenAPI Reference
developers/openapi.description: The full OpenAPI specification is maintained at openapi/openapi.yaml.

developers/sdk.title: SDK
developers/sdk.description: Client libraries for interacting with the chain.

evm_migration/MATCHES.title: EVM/Hardhat Audit Matches
evm_migration/MATCHES.description: This document lists all discovered EVM/Hardhat-related artifacts, their classification, and actions taken during the Cosmos SDK migration.

legacy-frontend-readme.title: Legacy Frontend README
legacy-frontend-readme.description: This file contains references to the previous detailed frontend documentation that was in the main README.md before the repository standardization.

legal/licensing.title: Licensing
legal/licensing.description: Code is released under the Apache-2.0 license. Modules may carry additional terms; see individual files.

legal/privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
legal/privacy-policy.description: API logs and telemetry are used for debugging and deleted after 30 days. No personal data is sold.

legal/README.title: Legal Docs
legal/README.description: These legal documents apply to participation in the Dytallix public testnet.

legal/terms-testnet.title: Testnet Terms
legal/terms-testnet.description: Participation is at your own risk. Tokens have no monetary value. Do not use for production. Rate limits apply.

modules/bridge.title: Bridge Module
modules/bridge.description: Facilitates cross-chain asset and message transfer.

modules/faucet.title: Faucet Module
modules/faucet.description: Dispenses testnet tokens with abuse prevention.

modules/index.title: Modules Overview
modules/index.description: Core and planned modules within the Dytallix network.

modules/pqc-crypto.title: PQC Crypto Module
modules/pqc-crypto.description: Integrates post-quantum primitives (e.g., Dilithium) in a hybrid model.

modules/staking.title: Staking Module
modules/staking.description: Provides delegation, validator lifecycle, and reward distribution.

modules/telemetry.title: Telemetry Module
modules/telemetry.description: Aggregates metrics and emits structured events.

operators/upgrades-resets.title: Upgrades & Resets
operators/upgrades-resets.description: Handle network upgrades and state resets.

operators/validator-node-setup.title: Validator Node Setup
operators/validator-node-setup.description: Run a validator on the public testnet.

README.title: Dytallix Public Testnet Docs
README.description: Start here for all public testnet information. Use the tiles below to jump to a section.

security/overview.title: Security Overview
security/overview.description: This section provides an overview of security goals, threat model, and controls for the Dytallix testnet.

start/overview.title: Overview
start/overview.description: The public testnet lets developers and operators experiment with Dytallix in a safe environment. It targets builders, validators, and security researchers.

start/quickstart.title: Quickstart
start/quickstart.description: Get a node running and send your first transaction.

start/testnet-rules.title: Testnet Rules
start/testnet-rules.description: Guidelines for using the Dytallix public testnet.

users/explorer-guide.title: Explorer Guide
users/explorer-guide.description: Use the explorer to inspect blocks and transactions.

users/faucet-guide.title: Faucet Guide
users/faucet-guide.description: Request test tokens via UI or API.
